value:
$nMPID_双界外伝カチュア|I'm often mistaken for Thea while I'm
out on patrol... Is it the hair? It must
be the hair, right?

$nMPID_ティト|Younger siblings are to be spoiled
and scolded as need demands.
Catria and I are of one mind there.

$nMPID_双界外伝カチュア|The middle sister must be a bridge
between younger and older. Few can
truly understand... But Thea does.

$nMPID_ティト|I would happily take armor and lance
over a frilly dress any day... But some
variety can't hurt, I suppose.

$nMPID_双界外伝カチュア|I hadn't imagined other worlds would
have trios who had mastered the art
of the Triangle Attack as well...

Greetings. I'm Catria, and this is Thea.
We've come as envoys on the behalf
of $Nf.

$nMPID_双界外伝カチュア|All right, Thea! If we keep this up,
we're sure to reach new heights!

$nMPID_ティト|With Catria at my back, I can devote
all my focus to what's in front of me.

$nMPID_ティト|Oof. Let's try not to overdo it. If we
accomplish our mission, we'll have
performed well enough...

$nMPID_双界外伝カチュア|Thank you. Thea and I will be sure
to put this to good use.

I'm Catria, of Macedon's Whitewings,
and this is Thea, of the Ilian pegasus
knights. Azure Wings, at your service.

$nMPID_双界外伝カチュア|I used to think there was no one I'd
rather share the sky with than Palla,
Est, or even Princess Minerva...$k$p$nMPID_ティト|I know what you mean. When I flew
alongside Juno or Shanna, my heart
always pounded with excitement.$k$p$nMPID_双界外伝カチュア|Exactly! Which is why it's so strange
that when I'm flying with you, I feel
so serene... Just perfectly in sync.$k$p$nMPID_ティト|I feel the same... It's like the joy of...
just being yourself. No performing
for others, just existing as you are.$k$pI think we're alike in more ways than
we may have thought. Perhaps right
down to the very core of our being.$k$p$nMPID_双界外伝カチュア|You may be right. In any case, I am
glad we met...and glad we can take
wing in Askr's azure skies together.
たあっ
いけるわ
きゃああっ
ドレスが…
$nMPID_二人|I do!
$nMPID_二人|We bring... Love!
$nMPID_カチュア|By your side...
$nMPID_ティト|This is all for you!
This can't be...
Was this my fate?
You're the best!
You're not alone.
"You look radiant!" "As do you."
"Here we go!" "Count on me!"
ふふ…
"How do I look?" "Like a true bride!"
Not my first choice...
To be by his side...
Wait for me!

$nMPID_ティト|A bridal festival... I wonder when
my big day is destined to arrive.

$nMPID_カチュア|It'll come. You're so sweet, and you'll
make a fine match sooner than later.

$nMPID_ティト|That's very kind of you to say.
But surely the same is true of you!
You look beautiful in that dress...

$nMPID_カチュア|I appreciate the compliment, but...
I don't see myself wearing something
like this for real.
$nMPID_ティト|Oh... Are you sure about that?

$nMPID_カチュア|Mm... Would you say it is proper
to agree to marry when, deep in
your heart, you love another?
$nMPID_ティト|Another? So you have a secret love...

$nMPID_カチュア|I can't ignore my heart... So I must
content myself to serve at his side.

$nMPID_ティト|I understand how you feel, but...
can you really settle for that and
truly be happy?

There is someone out there who
would be lucky to have you. And
seeing you in that dress...$k$pI cannot help but say that you
deserve to be loved!

$nMPID_カチュア|Oh, Thea... Let's not get ahead
of ourselves! And what about you?
You're also dressed as a bride...

$nMPID_ティト|I'm not really sure... I can tell you
that my older sister's wedding was
eye-opening.

I don't mean that it was fancy...
because it wasn't. It's just...I've
never seen her so happy.

Seeing two people...standing so close,
so close that they seem almost to
become one... It has an effect.$k$pYou want that for yourself.

$nMPID_カチュア|Your day will come. And when
it does, I'll be there to celebrate!

$nMPID_ティト|And when your wedding comes,
I'll expect an invitation!

$nMPID_カチュア|Hee hee! All right, then. I suppose
we both have something to look
forward to!
